website_summaries.verdict: A shiny lip gloss that protects and heals lips.
pros: A thick formula that soothes lips
Applicator delivers the right amount of product
Comes in 14 shimmery colors and 17 high-shine colors
Creamy formula doesn't feel sticky on the lips
cons: Some users had a bad reaction to the product, causing lips to burn

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, long wearing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipgloss, although the color is too light on me. I will wear it over a darker lipstick. Will buy again in another shade next time. Love the feel.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Williams

customer_reviews.title: Marc jacobs enamored hi-shine lip lacquer
customer_reviews.text: I did not see any difference in this and cheaper lip gloss. Color is pretty and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia platt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color and formula! I carry it with me everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa J

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Loved the lip gloss and how quick it was delivered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Marc Jacobs. Love this shade. Please do not discontinue! Excellent high end quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stiefel

customer_reviews.title: but others as just as good for less cost
customer_reviews.text: It was okay, but others as just as good for less cost.
customer_reviews.author: katie kay

customer_reviews.title: Jaclyn Hill made me buy it...
customer_reviews.text: Let's be real, we all bought this because of Jaclyn Hill since we're a bunch of suckers. BUT I can definitely see why this is so hyped, and it's due to the formula. It is so creamy and never starts to feel sticky or gunky on the lips, which a lot of glosses do. I like the color, but kind of wish I had chosen a different shade. Sugar Sugar looks amazing on top of lip sticks/liquid lips, but I don't love how it looks on it's own. But I guess that depends on your preference. Either way, it's a nice splurge!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I loved this! It's very glossy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! It's very glossy, which I would usually stay away from, but I really like the looks of this. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive lips
customer_reviews.text: I had some a reaction to this lip gloss it caused like a chemical burn on my lips
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Less than impressed by this strange, sticky solution.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those purchases that you will regret every time you see the product advertised. Why did I spend a fortune for lip gloss in a boring shade that doesn't even feel great on? There is nothing that sets this particular product apart from the rest of the designer lip glosses in the market, and this particular one is in a creepy shade that makes you look like you just didn't wipe the food off your lips. There are a couple of pros, however, it will last forever because you will almost never wear it... And you can say you own something by Marc Jacobs. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amber K

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by the staying power of thid gloss. I just got done eating lunch and my lips look great!! I also love the color. I can layer it over any color lipstick but I prefer doing it over rose color or nude. I was worried about it being sticky but after about half hour, it's fine and I can't even tell it's on there! I say YES!
customer_reviews.author: J. Zink

product_meta.title: Marc Jacobs Enamored Hi-Shine Lip Lacquer (312 Sugar Sugar)
product_meta.description: A high-shine lip lacquer in covetable shades with lasting brilliance.
feature_bullets: Features a non-sticky, luxurious and cushiony texture
Formulated with a breakthrough Triple Shine Complex comprising high-performance ingredients provides
